LogoutConfirmPopup.title: Confirmation
LogoutConfirmPopup.body: Are you sure you want to log out?

Secure.subtitle: Secure your wallet with state of art the Google Authenticator based 2FA.
Enter/scan the code in your Google Authenticator App and you are ready.
Keep the code, Hexa pub key and the secondary mnenmonic safe and secure in a separate location.

Joint.subtitle: Create a Joint Account in less than a minute with your partner/friend across the globe. Enter your name and name the account to generate a QR Code.
Other party scans the QR code and sends an acknowledgement. As soon as you acknowledge your account is ready for action.
Any of you can initiate the transaction but needs to be signed by both.

Vault.subtitle: Save your funds for important occasions by locking them up for a pre-set duration.
Your funds are released and ready to use on the pre-set date.

SecureSecretKeyScreen.title: Secret
SecureSecretKeyScreen.subTitle: Scan the above QR or enter the secret manually into your Google Authenticator
SecureSecretKeyScreen.subTitle1: Please keep the following details safe with you as they are crucial for recovery of the secure account (and we won't be storing it).

BackupPhraseScreen.bodyMsg1: These 12 words are they only way to restore your Hexa Wallet App.
BackupPhraseScreen.bodyMsg2: Save them somewhere safe and secret.

VerifyBackupPhraseScreen.bodyMsg1: Tap the words to put them next to each other in the correct order.
